channel.title: Writing Dones on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Writing Dones on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
imagine a world without this screen…

in this world, anything you want to create you must find it in reality, you must engage in the steps forward to put what you imagination into action, we must work into the vision of what we want to see happen we have to make sense of the problem, to make sense from non sense

we have to create how we sense, to give life to the unknown, and along the way, the conversation between our senses stitches together the known and unknown, and the process becomes a dance, of revealing itself.

the internet is where we come to know things to be a valid human to get numbers and confirm we are accepted we use technology factually, realistically

the internet is something we take seriously as a reflection of our identity its not a place to be something you’r’e not we share to put our best foot forward

we like and follow each other to reinforce that we are having a valid human experience here and the closer you can follow a formula, the more it appears you are connected to humanity
